text.div:
SeverityCodelist-to-AllergyIntoleranceSeverity (http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/snomed/ConceptMap/SeverityCodelist-to-AllergyIntoleranceSeverity)

Mapping from http://decor.nictiz.nl/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.2.8.2.6--20150401000000 to http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/reaction-event-severity

ACTIVE. Published on Jan 4, 2017 9:27:28 AM by Nictiz (Nictiz: info@nictiz.nl). CC0

Maps the HCIM AllgergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for the concept Serverty to the FHIR STU3 terminology bound at AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity


Source CodeEquivalenceDestination Code
MILDequalmild
MODequalmoderate
SEVequalsevere

name: SeverityCodelist-to-AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
title: HCIM SeverityCodelist to AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
description: Maps the HCIM AllgergyIntolerance release 2015 terminology for the concept Serverty to the FHIR STU3 terminology bound at AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity
purpose: To aid in mapping from ZIB AllgergyIntolerance value set SeverityCodelist to FHIR STU3 AllergyIntolerance.reaction.severity
